DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate effect wear 'Nike Free'Shoe isokinetic muscle strength foot ankle proprioception follow protocol use . The test population consist student physical education department . They random divide three group . One group wear shoe daily activity , second group wear shoe warm part sport class control group wear shoe . There two moment evaluation : one beginning study one four month , shoe use . The isokinetic strength measure isokinetic device ( Biodex ) proprioception evaluate force platform ( Neurocom Balance Master ) .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Wearing 'Nike Free'Shoe Isokinetic Muscle Strength Foot Ankle Proprioception .
DOC.criteria: physical education student second third year read sign informed consent new Nike Free Shoe neurological systemic disease overuse injury orthopaedic surgery low limbs previous six month familiar use wear Nike Free Shoe
